about_the_game:
About This Game

This is a SHORT (30 - 60 minutes long) kinetic visual novel, that continues from an early part of Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part II : No Regrets For The Future.

Whilst playing that game would be advantageous, there is a brief recap at the start of the main story.

The Story

A year previous to this story, the protagonist rescued the megalomaniacal, kleptomaniac Grendel Jinx from a near-fatal tower explosion. After doing so, the protagonist signs a "Friendship Agreement" with her, not realising exactly how problematic - and financially ruinous - it would be.

Grendel, annoyed by the protagonist's refusal to do her homework, takes matters into her own hands in order to get everything handed in on time, so she wouldn't have to repeat a year.

A year previous to this story, the protagonist rescued the megalomaniacal, kleptomaniac Grendel Jinx from a near-fatal tower explosion. After doing so, the protagonist signs a "Friendship Agreement" with her, not realising exactly how problematic - and financially ruinous - it would be.

Grendel, annoyed by the protagonist's refusal to do her homework, takes matters into her own hands in order to get everything handed in on time, so she wouldn't have to repeat a year.

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part II : No Extra Regrets For The Future

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or later
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part II : No Extra Regrets For The Future Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 upwards
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit version only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit version only

short_description: Annoyed by the protagonist's refusal to do her homework, Grendel Jinx takes matters into her own hands, in order to make sure she isn't held back a year
